articles.title: How AI is unlocking a cleaner energy future
articles.author: Rakesh Jaggi
articles.summary: AI and energy are two of the most critical forces shaping the future of our planet. The rapid adoption of AI is driving a surge in global energy demand that is outpacing the growth of renewable energy sources.
